21  package org.opencastproject.external.util;
22  
23  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.DublinCore;
24  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.DublinCoreMetadataCollection;
25  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.MetadataField;
26  
27  import java.util.List;
28  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
29  import java.util.stream.Collectors;
30  
31  public final class ExternalMetadataUtils {
32    private ExternalMetadataUtils() {
33    }
34  
35    /**
36     * Change a subject metadata field for a subjects json array.
37     *
38     * @param collection
39     *          The collection to update subject to subjects.
40     */
41    public static void changeSubjectToSubjects(final DublinCoreMetadataCollection collection) {
42      // Change subject to subjects.
43      final MetadataField subject = collection.getOutputFields().get(DublinCore.PROPERTY_SUBJECT.getLocalName());
44      collection.removeField(subject);
45      final List<String> newValue;
46      if (subject.getValue() != null) {
47        newValue = Pattern.compile(",").splitAsStream(subject.getValue().toString()).collect(Collectors.toList());
48      } else {
49        newValue = null;
50      }
51      collection.addField(new MetadataField(
52              subject.getInputID(),
53              "subjects",
54              subject.getLabel(),
55              subject.isReadOnly(),
56              subject.isRequired(),
57              newValue,
58              subject.isTranslatable(),
59              MetadataField.Type.ITERABLE_TEXT,
60              subject.getCollection(),
61              subject.getCollectionID(),
62              subject.getOrder(),
63              subject.getNamespace(),
64              subject.getListprovider(),
65              subject.getPattern(),
66              subject.getDelimiter()));
67    }
68  
69    /**
70     * Remove the collection list from the metadata to reduce to amount of data
71     *
72     * @param metadata
73     *          The metadata from which the list have to be removed
74     */
75    public static void removeCollectionList(final DublinCoreMetadataCollection metadata) {
76      // Change subject to subjects.
77      final List<MetadataField> fields = metadata.getFields();
78      for (final MetadataField f : fields) {
79        f.setCollection(null);
80        f.setCollectionID(null);
81      }
82    }
83  }
